thread.title_full: Multitrip reviewed by Orlaith Bannerman and Garret Hunt

author: Orlaith Bannerman and Garret Hunt
title: Orlaith Bannerman and Garret Hunt
text: No issues, everything handled well over the phone. My only reservation would be that my husband had to pay a supplement for his disability of having M.S with a extra charge of â‚¬10.00 which wasn't explained why there was an extra charge to our policy. Other than that good service taken by phone to set up our policy.
